headline: 3 No-Brainer Fintech Stocks to Buy Right Now for Less Than $1,000
summary: Given that money -- and technology -- make the world go round, it's not surprising that the combination can make for some of the world's most rewarding investments.  Bill offers a range of accounting software to enterprises of all sorts and sizes.  Bill is still something of a standout within this space, though.
